attributes.action: introduce legislation at UK level that will effect a change in the law that would prohibit Members of (UK) Parliament from serving as Members of Scottish Parliamament at the same time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Being an elected member of Parliament is a full time (and more) role, to do it effectivly a member must give it his all, the role of a member of parliament cannot and should not be seen to be a part time job.

This goes for both members of the House of Commons, and Members of the Scottish Parliament.

Lets bring an end to this so that people throughout the country can get the services of a full time member of parliament.
